comments.comment: Ape hamuduruwane api me ennau sansara gamanedi me wage ottuwela rata wenuvan lokewenuvan hada naga ottuwemin koitaram durak api enna atida..? Manussa jeevita labenna niwan dakinna pirimiyak wela upadinna Loku pinakata oba wahanse niwan dakinna wada karanna sansare ganiyanna epa tawa duratath. Me loke pawatinna wagema nopawatinnath hetu enava. Ewath ekka gatenavata wada hoda labuna u manussa jeevitaya budhdiyan Kalpana karala niwanata maga sada ganimai. MONA ELIYA PATHTU KARATH WADAKNE AYA NIWANAVA KALEKIN LABINA U MANUSSA ELIYA NIWA GANNA ONI TAMANVISINMAI EKA KAWADAVATH KATAWATH NIWANNA BE. TERUVANSARANAI....!!!
